attributes.review: I’ve only downloaded the app for a couple of minutes and I got so many notifications in a few seconds and it was starting to blow up my phone
attributes.title: Problems

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it crashes ALL the time not to mention how it somehow hacked into my phone and made peppa and Mickey Mouse do cartwheels in my sleep. I ended up with a complete orange screen but when i zoomed out I réalisés what it was. Gen Z ain’t goin down without a fight, so bring it ON👁👅👁
attributes.title: Screech

attributes.review: I wish I could rate it zero stars. I downloaded the app and it constantly crashed my phone. I eventually had to buy a new phone as the app drained my battery drastically and constantly caused my phone to crash.
attributes.title: Spam app

attributes.review: This app just kept making my phone crash. It also kept saying racist and misogynistic things! Awful! I do not recommend downloading it. It even tried to hack my data!
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Ok so first off it’s assuming I have a phone as if I’m rich ugh now idk howwww to get in the app Donald if you want me to use your app give me a phone number or a phone cause I do not have a phone number to use so I can get in your app thank you
attributes.title: I hate it

attributes.review: Every time I went on to the app it would make my phone freeze so I would have to turn it all the way off and back on just to make it work again.
attributes.title: Malfunctions

attributes.review: I downloaded to see what his ideas were to crash and get kicked out each time I got in it must be a poorly thought of and poorly developed app with not much time and money out into it
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: It took forever to download, like about a whole WEEK. And when I opened the app, all I saw was a rapist. Rapist should not be allowed to have an app. 😔 Honestly about to take this up with Apple because this is not okay. They should not give a rapist an app.
attributes.title: Honestly failure

attributes.review: This app relies on misinformation and people believing whatever lies the trump administration puts out. Designed to make to think link a Trumpster rather than receive actual information. Get your news and information elsewhere.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded the app To show support for the president,but it kept on crashing everytime i would go on the app! And if it didn’t crash it would freeze!!! 😔😔😔
attributes.title: Kept crashing and freezing
